wikipedia_page.main:
Charles Harvey Dixon (1862 – 22 September 1923)
was a British Conservative Party politician.

response: The estate was sold by the Earl of Ancaster to Charles Harvey Dixon in 1906.conveyance in Lincs Archives

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1922 United Kingdom general election
List of MPs elected in the January 1910 United Kingdom general election

response: The Rutland and Stamford by-election of 1923 was held on 30 October 1923.  The by-election was held due to the death of the incumbent Conservative MP, Charles Harvey Dixon.  It was won by the Conservative candidate Neville Smith-Carington.
